sentences.sentence: The enemy is so desirous of peace that he will agree to any terms.
sentences.translation: 敌人如此渴望和平，他会同意任何条件。

sentences.sentence: At that point Franco was desirous of prolonging the war.
sentences.translation: 那时，佛朗哥希望战争能延续下去。

sentences.sentence: Therefore I am desirous to get this post.
sentences.translation: 因此我很想得到这一职位。
